item.title: About
item.description: Greetings, I am Hou Teng Cheong. I received my B.S.E. in Electrical Engineering from NTU in 2018. My research interest includes algorithm design, computational complexity and graph theory. Recently my research focus on hole detecting algorithms. I am now in suspension of my master program. Publications Finding a Shortest Even Hole in Polynomial Time Hou-Teng Cheong, Hsueh-I Lu J. Graph Theory, 2022; Volume 99:425-434
